84th Academy Awards | underway on ABC

Live updates: Spencer wins best supporting actress

Octavia Spencer won for "The Help." Follow commentary from critics, ask questions, see photos, and more.
  • Culture Desk Critic Wesley Morris live now on Oscars

Pictures: Onstage highlights and wins

Octavia Spencer accepted the Oscar for best actor in a supporting role for "The Help." AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill
Robert Richardson accepted the award for best cinematography for "Hugo." AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill
Host Billy Crystal performed at the start of the ceremony. AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill
George Clooney, best actor nominee for his role in "The Descendants," and girlfriend Stacy Keibler. REUTERS/Lucy Nicholson
Glenn Close, best actress nominee for her role in "Albert Nobbs." REUTERS/Lucy Nicholson
Michelle Williams is nominated for her portrayal of Marilyn Monroe in "My Week With Marilyn." REUTERS/Lucy Nicholson
Actress Missi Pyle from the film "The Artist," which is nominated for Best Picture. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson
Celebrities, such as Medford native's Maria Menounos, are all glammed up for the movie industry's big night. Jason Merritt/Getty Images
